mapper.select: select t.user_id, t.user_name, t.pwd, t.pay_pwd, t.real_name, t.email, t.mobile_phone, t1.role_id from user t left join user_role t1 on t.user_id=t1.user_id where t.mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.user_id, t.user_name, t.pwd, t.pay_pwd, t.real_name, t.email, t.mobile_phone, t.add_time, t.last_update_dtime, t3.id_no, t3.type_id, t2.pic, t2.thumbnail_pic FROM user t LEFT JOIN user_identify t3 ON t.user_id=t3.user_id LEFT JOIN user_pic t2 ON t.user_id=t2.user_id WHERE t.mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
